title: Grimm Meisaku Gekijou (Grimm's Fairy Tale Classics)
synopsis: The series consists of mostly stand-alone episodes which retell different fairy or folk tales.  Despite the title, they are not all based on fairy tales collected by the Grimm Brothers.
voices: ['Horie, Mitsuko', 'Tamagawa, Sakiko', 'Fujii, Kayoko', 'Hori, Katsunosuke', 'Honda, Chieko', 'Koyama, Mami', 'Kikuchi, Masami', 'Horie, Mitsuko', 'Tsuru, Hiromi', 'Yanami, Jouji']
staff: [['Kramer, Steve', ['Script']], ['Miyazaki, Akira', ['Storyboard', ' Screenplay']], ['Aoki, Nozomi', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Hashimoto, Ushio', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
